channel.title: How do i add tele command
channel.description: how do i add a tele command?

item.title: How do i add tele command
item.dc:creator: @Backlash Backlash
item.description:
@Backlash wrote:

[quote=“classy zezima, post:1, topic:273101”]how do i add a tele command?[/quote] DeltaScape uses a toX/toY method of teleportation, the following is a base for the teleport if you want it.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME")&& playerRights >= 2){ toX = XCOORD; toY = YCOORD;

You need to add the teleblock void if you want it, otherwise that’s the base.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add tele command

item.title: How do i add tele command
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“classy zezima, post:7, topic:273101”]im useing delta there is no tele commands
i just want the base no need to explain what to put “just the base”[/quote]Funny. I have an un-edited DeltaScape source sitting on my CP, and just searching “tele” in the client class and I immediately found this:

if (command.startsWith("tele") && playerRights >= 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); toX = newPosX; toY = newPosY; }

Shut down your computer and never turn it back on. It’ll be better for all of us.

Read full topic
